group_1.textLeft: Huh? That's why you're buying a notebook?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...

group_1.textLeft: You've always tried hard not to make your@mom worry, haven't you?

group_1.textRight: Hm, maybe?

group_1.textLeft: I mean, remember back when we were little,@climbing that tree?

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah! That!

group_1.textLeft: Your foot slipped, and you fell off the@branch.

group_1.textRight: But I curled up and hit the ground rollin'!@I was up in a flash!

group_1.textLeft: You weren't up in a flash!

group_1.textRight: Wha!

group_1.textLeft: Didn't you break your left collarbone?

group_1.textRight: [chara:301501:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Well yeah, that's true.

group_1.textLeft: But you never said a word about it to your@mom.
You'd tell her, "I'm fine! I'm fine!" Even@though you definitely weren't!
The pain got so bad that you had to be@rushed to the hospital.

group_1.textRight: Yeaaah...
But, well, you know how my mom is. She@worries about every little thing.
So, you know...

group_1.textLeft: I think you should be more open with her.

group_1.textRight: I know.
But hey! Let's all go tree climbing again@sometime!

group_1.textLeft: Whaaat? I can't anymore!

group_1.textRight: [chara:301501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I'm just as good as I always was!

group_1.textLeft: Seika won't even be able to get off the@ground.

group_1.textRight: Hmm, well, she wasn't exactly good at it@to begin with.

group_1.textLeft: Right?

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah, we were up in a tree the first time@we saw her, right?

group_1.textLeft: Hehe! We sure were!

group_1.narration: Come on, hurry! You can see for forever up@here!
Wow! You're right! This tree's really high!
Look, the one sitting in the park over@there.
Is she the one who just moved here?

group_1.textRight: You were the one who said we should go@say hi, Leila.

group_1.textLeft: That's right.
(She just looked so lonely.)

group_1.textRight: The three of us were always together after@that.

group_1.textLeft: We sure were.

group_1.textRight: Oh! That reminds me! We should do hopscotch!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What? Like we used to do around the block?@That was really hard!

group_1.textRight: But Seika can do it too!
How about we play it all the way to the@bookstore?

group_1.textLeft: That's way too far!

group_1.textRight: By the way, what book are you going to buy?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, it's a cookbook for how to make sweets.

group_1.textRight: Oh! So you're going to make somethin'@again!

group_1.textLeft: Mhmm! I saw people talking about it on TV.
You can make so many cute little pastries@with all the recipes in there!

group_1.textRight: [chara:301501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Let me have some when you make them!

group_1.textLeft: Of course!
